title: Revolt Motors will soon start exports of its electric bikes
description: Revolt Motors is set to begin exporting its electric motorcycles, starting with Sri Lanka. The company has received interest from various countries and plans to expand its portfolio. Revolt aims to open 15 dealerships in Sri Lanka within four months and is preparing for increased sales with government incentives under the PM E-DRIVE scheme.
